userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] William A. Swanberg Papers, M0181, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: William Andrew Swanberg, a free lance writer, was born 23 November 1907 in St. Paul, Minnesota. He worked for Dell Publishing Co. as an editor before going free lance in 1945.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Summary: Collection includes biographical research for a biography of Theodore Dreiser, personal correspondence, writings, and material collected on the assassinatiin of John F. Kennedy.
